description: This file contains code that sets up an agent with specific models and tools, runs a stock price query, and prints various metrics and responses related to the agent's operation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of running tasks and maintaining responses.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from an agent run, including messages, metrics, and other session data.

classes.name: Llama
classes.description: A model class representing the Llama language model with specific configurations.

methods.name: pprint_run_response
methods.description: Pretty prints the run response stream, optionally in markdown format.

methods.name: pprint
methods.description: Pretty prints objects, used here for metrics and session data.
